channel.title: Week 12: Cloud Computing on PSU Astro 528
channel.description: Recent content in Week 12: Cloud Computing on PSU Astro 528

item.title: Learning goals
item.description: Week 12 Project Gain experience with second mechanism for parallelizing real world code Work towards achieving a significant performance benefit via second parallelization Readings / Discussions Describe benefits and disadvantages of cloud computing Determine whether a project would be well suited for running in the cloud
